mapper.select: SELECT M.MR_NUMBER,M.MR_STATE,I.IR_ID ,I.IR_STATE,I.IR_ITS_NAME,TO_CHAR(I.IR_PE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TIME1, I.IR_RES,A.AD_NAME, D.DI_NAME,DE.DEP_NAME FROM T_ITEMS_RECORD I LEFT JOIN T_MEC_RECORD M ON I.IR_MR_ID = M.MR_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICT D ON D.DI_CODE = I.IR_STATE LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT DE ON DE.DEP_ID = I.IR_DEP_ID LEFT JOIN T_ADMIN A ON A.AD_ID = I.IR_DOC_ID WHERE D.DI_TYPE ='ITEMSSTATE' AND MR_NUMBER = #{mecNum} AND I.IR_STATE != 4 ORDER BY I.IR_PE_TIME DESC

SELECT DISTINCT U.US_NAME,DA.DI_NAME SEX,U.US_AGE,DB.DI_NAME BLOOD,TO_CHAR(U.US_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') TIMEE,U.US_PHONE, U.US_ADDRESS,U.US_NATIVEPLACE ,C.CA_BALANCE FROM T_USER U LEFT JOIN T_CARD C ON C.CA_USER_ID = U.US_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICT DA ON DA.DI_CODE = U.US_SEX LEFT JOIN T_DICT DB ON DB.DI_CODE = U.US_BLOODTYPE LEFT JOIN T_MEC_RECORD M ON M.MR_CA_ID = C.CA_ID WHERE DA.DI_TYPE = 'SEX' AND DB.DI_TYPE = 'BLOODTYPE' AND M.MR_NUMBER = #{mecNum}
SELECT IR_RES FROM T_ITEMS_RECORD WHERE IR_ID = #{irId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MEC_RECORD SET MR_REQ = #{req},MR_GUIDE = #{guide},MR_TIME = SYSDATE,MR_DOC_ID = #{docName},MR_STATE = 3 WHERE MR_NUMBER = #{mecNum}
